attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We were promised years ago that if we recycled a lot of our rubbish we would get a reduction in the community tax this has not happened in fact it has gone up again  ... were do you think we are going to get all this money from? we have not got unlimited supply... the taxation in this country is the highest in europe and it`s got to stop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
